Package simula

package simula

The Simula System.

This is a Simula System created by the Open Source Project 'Portable Simula Revisited'. The project was initiated as a response to the lecture held by James Gosling at the 50th anniversary of Simula in Oslo on 27th September, 2017.

More Info: Portable Simula Revisited.
